mapper.update:
update neuedu_product
category_id = #{product.categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
name = #{product.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
subtitle = #{product.subtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
main_image = #{product.mainImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
price = #{product.price,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
stock = #{product.stock,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{product.status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sub_images = #{product.subImages,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
detail = #{product.detail,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
update_time = now(),
where id = #{product.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select a.id, a.category_id, a.name, a.subtitle, a.main_image, a.price, a.stock, a.status, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.sub_images, a.detail, b.id AS c_id, b.parent_id AS c_parent_id, b.name AS c_name, b.status AS c_status, b.sort_order AS c_sort_order, b.create_time AS c_create_time, b.update_time AS c_update_time from neuedu_product a JOIN neuedu_category b ON a.category_id=b.id where a.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select a.id, a.category_id, a.name, a.subtitle, a.main_image, a.price, a.stock, a.status, a.create_time, a.update_time, a.sub_images, a.detail, b.id AS c_id, b.parent_id AS c_parent_id, b.name AS c_name, b.status AS c_status, b.sort_order AS c_sort_order, b.create_time AS c_create_time, b.update_time AS c_update_time from neuedu_product a JOIN neuedu_category b ON a.category_id=b.id
